rooms.description: A wide entrance hallway that welcomes the Vastu energy flow with a west-facing entry aligning with auspicious directions. Decorated with bohemian elements such as vintage mirrors and local art.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that let in ample natural light from the west. Furnished with eclectic furniture pieces accentuating a Bohemian vibe.
A modern kitchen seamlessly integrated with a dining space, designed for efficient workflow. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning work area in the northeast direction.
The master bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows and an adjoining balcony. Decorated in bohemian style with warm textures and vibrant patterns, ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
A comfortable second bedroom with a personal balcony, designed to maintain privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines for bedroom placement on the ground floor.
Well-lit bathroom with water element considerations in mind. Features essential fixtures and incorporates bohemian decor elements such as decorative tiles.

openings.description: Large wooden entrance door aligned to the west to welcome positive energy per Vastu principles.
Ample window openings ensuring natural light and ventilation, crucial for a Bohemian farmhouse aesthetic.
Each bedroom is equipped with an access door leading to a private balcony that overlooks the surroundings.
